Acceleor Profils Extension:
Tool to improve productivity of agents by helping them finding information faster on the page.
The tool is using the current search keys and extrapolates the query to it's general form. Then, the tool goes through all the results, sorts the informations, and put them together is a table.
The format of the table is user friendly, and can be downloaded for off-line consultation.
This particular extension is adapted to companies accounts results with extended geo informations.

This tool was created as a collaboration between ACCELEOR and PRF Development.

NO USER DATA IS COLLECTED!
Every cookie is deleted when the extension is closed.
